lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK sbd suriq ilv swDsMig prmdBuq pRym pUrn pRgwsy hY
lines.transliteration_english: Gurmukhi Sabad Surati Liv Saadhasangi , Paramadabhout Praym Pooran Pragaasay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Supernatural love grows in the heart of an obedient disciple of the Guru when he lodges the divine word in his consciousness and keeps the company of holy men.

lines.gurmukhi: pRym rMg my Anyk rMg ijau qrMg gMg pRym rs my Anyk rs huie iblwsy hY
lines.transliteration_english: Praym Rang May Anayk Rang Jiu Tarang Ganga , Praym Ras May Anayk Ras Hui Bilaasay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The company of saintly persons and perpetual Naam Simran, creates a loving hue like the waves of river Ganges that generates multi-coloured effects. The Guru-conscious person enjoys many elixirs in this loving state.

lines.gurmukhi: pRym gMD sMiD mY sugMD sMbMD koit pRym sRuiq Aink Anwhd aulwsy hY
lines.transliteration_english: Praym Gandh Sandhi Mai Sougandh Sanbandh Koti , Praym Srouti Anik Anaahad Ulaasay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Due to the practicing of Naam Simran, that fragrance is the combination of millions of fragrances. And the unstruck Music emerging from the loving fragrance of God, contains the pleasure of many modes of singing.

lines.gurmukhi: pRym Asprs komlqw sIqlqw kY AkQ kQw ibnod ibsm ibs√çwsy hY ]169]
lines.transliteration_english: Praym Asaparas Komalataa Seetalataa Kai , Akad Kadaa Binod Bisam Bisvaasay Hai ?169?

Shabad OS B.translation: None can reach the sensitivity and coolness of that love generated by Naam Simran). The pleasures and ecstasy are describable. It generates marvellous faith. (169)
